```{r setup}
library(dv.loader)
```

Note: `use_wd = T` can be used to source from local folder. Just set your working directory before using with `setwd()`, or use an explicit path in `sub_dir`.

## Usage: `load_data()`

```{r}
test_data_path <- "../inst/extdata"
data_list <- load_data(sub_dir = test_data_path,
                       file_names = "dummyads2",
                       use_wd = TRUE)


class(data_list)

class(data_list[["dummyads2"]])

head(data_list[["dummyads2"]])

```

Get the dataframe's metadata through its attributes:

```{r}
attr(data_list[["dummyads2"]], "meta")
```
